lines.text: So?
Oh my god, there was a big E above my head, what the hell is that thing?
Some kind of action prompt. These things vary from game to game, so not sure 100%.
So this is a game then? Oh my god, I can't believe this is happening!
Yeah it's a game, kind of.
What do you mean kind of?
Well this place, Suburbia, it's basically purgatory for buggy game characters.
Buggy characters?
Yeah some of us cause issues in the games we were supposed to be in,
So we get sent here before we cause too much damage.
I was supposed to be an enemy in an RPG.
But then I found out I was able to edit game properties.
See watch this, look at your couch.
HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
WHAZAM!
Woah that's crazy!
Heh, that's nothing. I'm kind of a big deal.
So you did that kind of stuff in your old game?
Yeah, it was fun while it lasted.
When the system found out I got banished here by the garbage collector.
What is the garbage collector?
Remember Deborah?
Oh my god...
Yeah, she picked you up from your game "The adventures of Normalman"
and banished you to this hellhole.
She's a real bitch.
I can't believe it. Nothing I know is real, I'm a fake!
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
Yo chill out, it's not so bad. Here, I know what will cheer you up.
ohmygodohmygodohmygodohmygodohmygodohmygod
HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
Tada! I spawned this big cake for you!
My life is a lie. I think I'm going to be sick.
You know you are being a real downer right now John.
You would be pretty shocked if you learned that you were just a work of fiction too!
Geez I get it, you're having an existential crisis. You're such a drama queen.
I'm sorry, but this kind of ne
Ahh shit, this guy.
I hate this guy.
